## SectionComponent type

A component that can be used to render a section template for vertical results.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SectionComponent = (props: SectionProps) => JSX.Element | null;
```
<b>References:</b> [SectionProps](./answers-react-components.sectionprops.md)
